name: additive
content:
additive

noun
 
/ˈædətɪv/
 
/ˈædətɪv/
jump to other results
  1. a substance that is added in small amounts to something, especially food, in order to improve it, give it colour, make it last longer, etc.
    • food additives
    • The classification of additives by ‘E’ number is made under an EU directive.
    • additive-free orange juice
    • chemical additives in petrol
